custom-action.name: sql_statement update timeout
custom-action.description: This action executes SQL statements. Possible parameters are: - type: (required) the type of SQL statement, possible values are QUERY and UPDATE. - connectionName: (required) the name of the connection to map with other advanced actions. - sqlStatement: (required) the SQL statement to execute. - variableName: (optional) the NeoLoad variable to put the value(s) in. - includeQueryResults: (optional) if set at false, the results are not included in the XML response. Default value is true. Should be "false" to optimize resource consumption when executing a query that returns multiple rows and retrieving the values from the variables. - batchSize: (optional) the batch number to keep in memory before performing a batch update. Default value is 500.

custom-action-parameter.name: sqlStatement
custom-action-parameter.value: UPDATE ushahidi_db.oauth_session_access_tokens SET access_token_expires='${newTS}' WHERE id='${OAUTH_Token_id_1}'
